description: Tapestry: Psyche at the Basketmakers; After design by François Boucher (French, 1703 - 1770), woven under the direction of André Charlemagne Charron (French, active 1754 - 1780), Beauvais Manufactory (French, founded 1664); Beauvais, France; possibly 1756 - 1757 but probably 1767 - 1771; Silk and wool; 344.1 × 253.3 cm (135 1/2 × 99 3/4 in.); 63.DD.4; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California

maker: After design by François Boucher, woven under the direction of André Charlemagne Charron, Beauvais Manufactory
name: Tapestry: Psyche at the Basketmakers
title: Tapestry: Psyche at the Basketmakers
